title: Searching for Gerald Giampa
content:
Hi all

I was briefly acquainted with Gerald Giampa I believe in 1969 / 1970  
in Lynn Valley in Vancouver, B.C.

I was reviewing some past reminiscences and wanted to briefly touch  
base with him. I hear that he is in Scandinavia now ? !

Could someone contact him who knows his e-mail address and see  
whether he is available for a short dialogue.

Thanks  
Richard Bidwell

 [‹ Weiss as a text font in a novel?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42193 "Go to previous forum topic") [Cut and then curved ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41687 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Searcher

comments.content: He’s back from Finland, and living in Vancouver. I don’t have a current email address for him, but he can often be found at Salmagundi West on West Cordova Street. Ask for him there.

Hi Richard,  
have you tried [Typophile’s contact function](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034255/http:/www.typophile.com/user/3861/contact)?
There are a few Gerald’s roaming around Typophile. I’ve added his last name to your query. Perhaps he’ll notice that and pop in for a quick chat.
